name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Judge.me reviews
description: Every time a new review is added to your Judge.me, Make will automatically add it to your Google Sheets as a row. Here's the [worksheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DRLLAD3h3X4lhcmKDC5fz_KZkVijxlUXoKDcY8geJaA/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
